title: Trump says trade talks with Canada 'terminated' over anti-tariffs advert
summary: The US president says he is axing negotiations over an advert that used Ronald Reagan speaking negatively about tariffs.

title: Inflation rose less than expected in September, the U.S. belatedly reports
summary: The federal government recalled some furloughed workers specifically to produce the inflation report, which plays a key role for Social Security beneficiaries.

title: Federal workers go without pay today. And, NBA stars arrested for illegal gambling
summary: Today, millions of federal workers are missing their first full paycheck since the shutdown began. And, an NBA gambling scandal has led to the arrest of over 30 people.

title: Boo to spooky chocolate prices! It's the year of chewy, fruity Halloween treats
summary: Sales of non-chocolate candy are growing faster than those of chocolate. With cocoa in shortage, manufacturers are changing pack sizes, adding fillers and dipping candy in "white creme."
content:
Sales of non-chocolate candy are growing faster than those of chocolate. With cocoa in shortage, manufacturers are changing pack sizes, adding fillers and dipping candy in "white creme."

title: It's supposed to be payday for many federal workers. Instead, they're getting nothing
summary: Roughly 1.4 million federal workers are going without pay due to the government shutdown. About half of them are furloughed, while the other half has been deemed essential and is working without pay.
content:
Roughly 1.4 million federal workers are going without pay due to the government shutdown. About half of them are furloughed, while the other half has been deemed essential and is working without pay.

(Image credit: Tyrone Turner/WAMU)

title: Here's what experts say 'A House of Dynamite' gets wrong (and right) about nuclear war
summary: Some praised realistic elements like the depiction of the White House situation room. But others said parts of the plot didn't ring true.
content:
A House of Dynamite is available online for streaming on October 24. Experts say the sets, such as this one of the White House situation room's watch floor, are "scarily authentic."'/>

Some praised realistic elements like the depiction of the White House situation room. But others said parts of the plot didn't ring true.

(Image credit: Eros Hoagland)

title: Not sure how to support a friend with cancer? Survivors have advice
summary: To help a loved one with cancer, think about what you're good at — and what they need. Are you organized? Plan their meals. Detail-oriented? Go with them to appointments. Survivors share ideas.
content: To help a loved one with cancer, think about what you're good at — and what they need. Are you organized? Plan their meals. Detail-oriented? Go with them to appointments. Survivors share ideas.

title: As strikes on alleged drug boats grow, so do questions about their legality and goal
summary: President Trump says he has authority to carry out the strikes, but international experts are asking if the attacks are truly about countering narcotics or instead toppling Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro.

President Trump says he has authority to carry out the strikes, but international experts are asking if the attacks are truly about countering narcotics or instead toppling Venezuela's Nicolás Maduro.

title: An enduring love born amidst early Alzheimer's
summary: Joanna Fix and Forrest Fix of Colorado Springs talk about living with Alzheimer's disease. They say it's all about learning how to live with it, not die from it.
content: Joanna Fix and Forrest Fix of Colorado Springs talk about living with Alzheimer's disease. They say it's all about learning how to live with it, not die from it.

title: Trump says he's ending trade talks with Canada over TV ads
summary: The abrupt announcement comes after Trump accused Canada of using a "fake" Ronald Reagan ad to sway U.S. courts, raising the stakes in an already tense trade dispute.
